title: Here's Jim Cramer 's theory of the emerging strategy at GameStop as its chief financial officer exits
text:
The stock more than doubled on Wednesday, and surged again in premarket trade on Thursday.

Jim Cramer , the CNBC personality, says new board member Ryan Cohen , the co-founder and former chief executive of e-commerce pet store Chewy CHWY, may have a bitcoin strategy in mind.

https://twitter.com/jimcramer/status/1364898750662119424 Cohen himself offered this cryptic clue on Wednesday â€” a frog emoji, with a picture of a McDonald's ice-cream cone.

https://twitter.com/ryancohen/status/1364650709669601289 GameStop was trading around $150 in premarket action on Thursday. It opened trading on Wednesday at $44.70.

Business intelligence provider MicroStrategy MSTR and electric-car maker Tesla TSLA are among the companies that have recently purchased bitcoin.
